mapper.select: select t.ldzl ldzlchina, t.rgyyfwl rgyyfwlchina, jtl jtlchina from DB_SW12366.TJ_YYFWFX_QG t where trunc(t.rq,'yyyy') = trunc(sysdate, 'yyyy') and rownum=1
SELECT sum(t.LDZL) yldzl, sum(t.rgyyfwl) yrgyyfwl, to_char(round(sum(t.rgyyfwl) / sum(t.zjrgl) * 100, 2)) yjtl FROM DB_SW12366.TJ_YYFWFX t where trunc(t.rq,'mm') = trunc(trunc(sysdate,'mm')-1,'mm')
SELECT sum(t.LDZL) yldzl, sum(t.rgyyfwl) yrgyyfwl, to_char(round(sum(t.rgyyfwl) / sum(t.zjrgl) * 100, 2)) yjtl FROM DB_SW12366.TJ_YYFWFX t where trunc(t.rq, 'yyyy') = trunc(sysdate, 'yyyy')
select t.dpid,a.unitname,t.DPZHWL,t.DPRPJJTL,t.DPMYL from db_sw12366.ywcl_dpxx t,db_sw12366.XTGL_UNIT a where t.dpid=a.unitcode(+)
SELECT sum(t.zdyyfwl) zdyyfwl, sum(t.rgyyfwl) rgyyfwl, sum(t.fql) fql FROM DB_SW12366.TJ_YYFWFX t where t.rq = trunc(sysdate)
select t.dpyhwl from db_sw12366.ywcl_dpxx t where t.dpid = '1'
select t.dpyhwl from db_sw12366.ywcl_dpxx t where t.dpid = '1'
select t.dpnhwl from db_sw12366.ywcl_dpxx t where t.dpid = '1'

select (case when sum(c.zjrgl) = 0 then '100' else to_char(round(sum(c.rgyyfwl) / sum(c.zjrgl) * 100, 2)) end) jtl FROM DB_SW12366.TJ_YYFWFX c where c.rq between trunc(sysdate, 'mm') and last_day(sysdate)

select (case when sum(c.fcmysum + c.mysum + c.ybsum + c.bmysum) = 0 then '100' else to_char(round((sum(c.fcmysum + c.mysum) / sum(c.fcmysum + c.mysum + c.ybsum + c.bmysum)) * 100, 2)) end) myl FROM DB_SW12366.TJ_YYFWFX c where c.rq between trunc(sysdate, 'mm') and last_day(sysdate)

select to_char(trunc(a.dh/(a.dh +a.ly+a.qt)*100,2),'fm999990.00') dh,to_char(trunc(a.ly/(a.dh +a.ly+a.qt)*100,2),'fm999990.00') ly,to_char((100-trunc(a.dh/(a.dh +a.ly+a.qt)*100,2)-trunc(a.ly/(a.dh +a.ly+a.qt)*100,2)),'fm999990.00') qt from ( select sum(decode(t.bmzdcode, '0601', t.slsum, 0)) dh, sum(decode(t.bmzdcode, '0606', t.slsum, 0)) ly, sum(decode(t.bmzdcode, '0601', 0, '0606', 0, t.slsum)) qt from db_sw12366.SH_YWQKTJ t where t.rq = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.tjlx = '1') a

select a.zx, decode(hj, 0, 0, to_char(trunc((a.zx / hj) * 100, 2), 'fm999990.00')) zxbfb, a.wjjb, decode(hj, 0, 0, to_char(trunc((a.wjjb / hj) * 100, 2), 'fm999990.00')) wjjbbfb, a.cx, decode(hj, 0, 0, to_char(trunc((a.cx / hj) * 100, 2), 'fm999990.00')) cxbfb, a.ssjb, decode(hj, 0, 0, to_char(trunc((a.ssjb / hj) * 100, 2), 'fm999990.00')) ssjbbfb, a.ts, decode(hj, 0, 0, to_char(trunc((a.ts / hj) * 100, 2), 'fm999990.00')) tsbfb, a.yjjy, decode(hj, 0, 0, to_char((100 - trunc((a.zx / hj) * 100, 2) - trunc((a.wjjb / hj) * 100, 2) - trunc((a.cx / hj) * 100, 2) - trunc((a.ssjb / hj) * 100, 2) - trunc((a.ts / hj) * 100, 2)), 'fm999990.00')) yjjybfb from (select sum(decode(t.bmzdcode, '0301', t.slsum, 0)) zx, sum(decode(t.bmzdcode, '0304', t.slsum, 0)) wjjb, sum(decode(t.bmzdcode, '0302', t.slsum, 0)) cx, sum(decode(t.bmzdcode, '0305', t.slsum, 0)) ssjb, sum(decode(t.bmzdcode, '0303', t.slsum, 0)) ts, sum(decode(t.bmzdcode, '0306', t.slsum, 0)) yjjy, sum(decode(t.bmzdcode, '0301', t.slsum, 0)) + sum(decode(t.bmzdcode, '0304', t.slsum, 0)) + sum(decode(t.bmzdcode, '0302', t.slsum, 0)) + sum(decode(t.bmzdcode, '0305', t.slsum, 0)) + sum(decode(t.bmzdcode, '0303', t.slsum, 0)) + sum(decode(t.bmzdcode, '0306', t.slsum, 0)) hj from db_sw12366.SH_YWQKTJ t where t.rq = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.tjlx = '2') a

select to_char(c.rq, 'yyyymm') rq, round((sum(c.fcmysl + c.mysl) / sum(c.fcmysl + c.mysl + c.ybsl + c.bmysl))*100,2) myl from DB_SW12366.SH_ZXYYGZQK c where to_char(c.rq, 'yyyymm') > to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') - 1 || to_char(sysdate, 'mm') group by to_char(c.rq, 'yyyymm') order by to_char(c.rq, 'yyyymm')

select to_char(c.rq, 'yyyymm') rq, round(sum(c.rgyyfwl) / sum(c.zjrgl) * 100, 2) jtl from DB_SW12366.TJ_YYFWFX c where to_char(c.rq, 'yyyymm') > to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') - 1 || to_char(sysdate, 'mm') group by to_char(c.rq, 'yyyymm') order by to_char(c.rq, 'yyyymm')

select to_char(c.rq, 'yyyymm') rq, sum(c.zdyyfwl) zdyyfwl, sum(c.rgyyfwl) rgyyfwl from DB_SW12366.TJ_YYFWFX c where to_char(c.rq, 'yyyymm') > to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') - 1 || to_char(sysdate, 'mm') group by to_char(c.rq, 'yyyymm') order by to_char(c.rq, 'yyyymm')

select to_char(c.rq, 'yyyymm') rq, sum(c.LDZL) ldzl from DB_SW12366.TJ_YYFWFX c where to_char(c.rq, 'yyyymm') > to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') - 1 || to_char(sysdate, 'mm') group by to_char(c.rq, 'yyyymm') order by to_char(c.rq, 'yyyymm')

select t.short_name unitname , z.ldzl from (select c.jgbm, sum(c.dpyhwl) as ldzl from (select decode(a.dpid, '131010800', '131010600', a.dpid) as jgbm, a.dpyhwl from DB_SW12366.ywcl_dpxx a where a.dpid not in ('1','2') ) c group by c.jgbm) z, t_unit_short_name t where z.jgbm = t.unitcode order by z.jgbm

select t.short_name unitname , z.ldzl from (select c.jgbm, sum(c.dprhwl) as ldzl from (select decode(a.dpid, '131010800', '131010600', a.dpid) as jgbm, a.dprhwl from DB_SW12366.ywcl_dpxx a where a.dpid not in ('1','2') ) c group by c.jgbm) z, t_unit_short_name t where z.jgbm = t.unitcode order by z.jgbm
select sum(c.rgyyfwl) rgfwl from db_sw12366.tj_yyfwfx c where to_char(c.rq,'yyyy')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')

select substr(t.rq, 0, 7) rq, substr(t.bmzdname, 0, 4) yjmc, substr(t.bmzdname, 7, 10) ejmc, sum(t.slsum) sl, trunc(sum(t.slsum)/300) sizee, min(t.bmzdcode) lxdm, '' enname from db_sw12366.sh_ywqktj t where t.tjlx = '3' and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm')=substr(t.rq,0,7) group by substr(t.rq, 0, 7), substr(t.bmzdname, 0, 4), substr(t.bmzdname, 7, 10) having sum(t.slsum) > 2000 order by sum(t.slsum) desc

select (substr(t.rq, 0, 4) || substr(t.rq, 6, 2)) rq, substr(t.bmzdname, 0, 4) yjmc, substr(t.bmzdname, 7, 10) ejmc, sum(t.slsum) sl, min(t.bmzdcode) lxdm, '' enname from db_sw12366.sh_ywqktj t where t.tjlx = '3' and substr(t.rq, 0, 4) || substr(t.rq, 6, 2) > to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') - 1 || to_char(sysdate, 'mm') and t.bmzdcode= #{lxdm} group by substr(t.rq, 0, 7), substr(t.bmzdname, 0, 4), substr(t.bmzdname, 7, 10), (substr(t.rq, 0, 4) || substr(t.rq, 6, 2)) having sum(t.slsum) > 2000 order by (substr(t.rq, 0, 4) || substr(t.rq, 6, 2))

select t.zxgh, t.xm, t.xj, t.zb, a.mc xl, b.mc zzmm, trunc((trunc(sysdate, 'yyyy') - trunc(t.rzsj, 'yyyy')) / 365) gznx from db_nfgl.T_DJ_ZXRYXX t, db_xtwh.t_dm_gy_xl a, db_xtwh.t_dm_gy_zzmm b where t.zzmm_dm = b.zzmm_dm and t.xl_dm = a.xl_dm and t.zxgh in (SELECT zxgh FROM (SELECT zxgh FROM db_nfgl.T_DJ_ZXRYXX a where a.yxbz = 'Y' ORDER BY dbms_random.value()) WHERE ROWNUM < 7)

select t.jthwl rgfwl, t.yygdscl gdsl, t.zxgdl, t.tsgdl, t.wfjbgdl wfwjgdl, trunc(t.dlsc) dlsc, trunc(t.pjthsc) pjthsc, trunc(t.pjhhclsc) pjhhclsc, round(case when t.fcmysl + t.mysl + t.ybsl + t.bmysl = 0 then 0 else 100 * (t.fcmysl + t.mysl) / (t.fcmysl + t.mysl + t.ybsl + t.bmysl) end, 0) as myl, t.fcmysl, t.mysl, t.ybsl, t.bmysl from DB_SW12366.SH_ZXYYGZQK t where t.zxgh = #{zxdm} and t.rq >= trunc(sysdate)

select sum(t.ldzl) ldzl, sum(t.jthwl) rgfwl, (case when sum(t.zjrgl) = 0 then 100 else round(sum(t.jthwl) / sum(t.zjrgl) * 100, 2) end) jtl from DB_SW12366.TJ_YYFWFX t where to_char(t.rq, 'yyyy') = to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1), 'yyyy') and t.jgbm != '1'

select sum(t.ldzl) ldzl, sum(t.jthwl) rgfwl, (case when sum(t.zjrgl) = 0 then 100 else round(sum(t.jthwl) / sum(t.zjrgl) * 100, 2) end) jtl from DB_SW12366.TJ_YYFWFX t where to_char(t.rq, 'yyyy') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') and t.rq <last_day(add_months(sysdate,-1)) and t.jgbm != '1'
select t.ldzl, t.rgyyfwl rgfwl, t.jtl from db_sw12366.tj_yyfwfx_qg t where rownum = 1 order by t.rq desc
